Cell¶

class biosim.cell.Ocean[source]¶

Cell subclass for all ocean landscape types. Ocean landscape cannot be traversed and contains no food.

Attributes
carnivores_in_cell

Gets number of carnivores in cell.

herbivores_in_cell

Gets number of herbivores in cell.

Methods

aging(self)

Updates animal age for all animals in cell.

calculate_relative_fodder(fodder, …)

Calculates amount of relative fodder in a cell.

deaths(self)

Checks whether an animal dies for all animals in cell.

feeding(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to feed.

fodder_growth(self)

Replenishes fodder for current cell.

loss_of_weight(self)

Reduces animal weight for all animals in cell

migration(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to migrate if they haven’t already migrated.

nearby_relative_fodder(self, animal)

Calculates the amount of fodder in nearby cells.

procreate(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to procreate.

sort_population(population)

Sorts a list of animals by their fitness in descending order.

Ocean initializer.

Attributes
carnivores_in_cell

Gets number of carnivores in cell.

herbivores_in_cell

Gets number of herbivores in cell.

Methods

aging(self)

Updates animal age for all animals in cell.

calculate_relative_fodder(fodder, …)

Calculates amount of relative fodder in a cell.

deaths(self)

Checks whether an animal dies for all animals in cell.

feeding(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to feed.

fodder_growth(self)

Replenishes fodder for current cell.

loss_of_weight(self)

Reduces animal weight for all animals in cell

migration(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to migrate if they haven’t already migrated.

nearby_relative_fodder(self, animal)

Calculates the amount of fodder in nearby cells.

procreate(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to procreate.

sort_population(population)

Sorts a list of animals by their fitness in descending order.
aging(self)¶

Updates animal age for all animals in cell.

static calculate_relative_fodder(fodder, animal_species, same_species)¶

Calculates amount of relative fodder in a cell.

Parameters

  • fodder (float) – fodder in cell

  • animal_species (Animal) – Type of animal

  • same_species (int) – Number of same species animals in cell

Returns

Amount of relative fodder in cell.

Return type

float

property carnivores_in_cell¶

Gets number of carnivores in cell.

deaths(self)¶

Checks whether an animal dies for all animals in cell. Dead animals are removed from the cell’s population.

feeding(self)¶

Each animal in the cell attempts to feed.

Each animal eats in order of their fitness. The most fit animal eats first.

Feeding is different for herbivores and carnivores. Herbivores eat plant fodder and carnivores eat herbivores.

Whenever a herbivore feeds, the amount of available fodder in the cell is reduced accordingly. Whenever a carnivore kills, the number of herbivores in the cell’s population is reduced.

fodder_growth(self)¶

Replenishes fodder for current cell.

property herbivores_in_cell¶

Gets number of herbivores in cell.

loss_of_weight(self)¶

Reduces animal weight for all animals in cell

migration(self)¶

Each animal in the cell attempts to migrate if they haven’t already migrated.

Migration is decided by amount of relative fodder in nearby cells. For herbivores, relative fodder is plant fodder. For carnivores, relative fodder is herbivores.

After an animal has migrated, its instance is removed from the cell’s population list.

nearby_relative_fodder(self, animal)¶

Calculates the amount of fodder in nearby cells.

Parameters

animal (Animal) – Either a class instance of Herbivore or Carnivore

Returns

relative_fodder_list – List containing relative fodder in nearby cells and cell type of nearby cells.

Return type

list

procreate(self)¶

Each animal in the cell attempts to procreate.

Each animal can only mate with another animal that is of same species and currently in the same cell as itself.

Each new born animal is added to the cell’s population.

static sort_population(population)¶

Sorts a list of animals by their fitness in descending order.

class biosim.cell.Mountain[source]¶

Cell subclass for all mountain landscape types. Mountain landscape cannot be traversed and contains no food.

class biosim.cell.Jungle[source]¶

Cell subclass for all jungle landscape types. Jungle landscape can be traversed and available food is fully replenished every year.

Attributes
carnivores_in_cell

Gets number of carnivores in cell.

herbivores_in_cell

Gets number of herbivores in cell.

Calculates the amount of fodder in nearby cells.

procreate(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to procreate.

sort_population(population)

Sorts a list of animals by their fitness in descending order.

class biosim.cell.Savannah[source]¶

Cell subclass for all savannah landscape types. Savannah landscape can be traversed and a portion of maximum available food is replenished every year.

Attributes
carnivores_in_cell

Gets number of carnivores in cell.

herbivores_in_cell

Gets number of herbivores in cell.

Methods

Replenishes fodder for current cell.

loss_of_weight(self)

Reduces animal weight for all animals in cell

migration(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to migrate if they haven’t already migrated.

nearby_relative_fodder(self, animal)

Calculates the amount of fodder in nearby cells.

procreate(self)

Each animal in the cell attempts to procreate.

sort_population(population)

Sorts a list of animals by their fitness in descending order.

Savannah initializer.

class biosim.cell.Desert[source]¶

Cell subclass for all desert landscape types. Desert landscape can be traversed and contains no fodder.

Attributes

Gets number of carnivores in cell.

herbivores_in_cell

Gets number of herbivores in cell.

Calculates the amount of fodder in nearby cells.

Each animal in the cell attempts to procreate.

sort_population(population)

Sorts a list of animals by their fitness in descending order.
